seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, education requirement is bachelor's level

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer', responsibilities include ETL, reporting, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization, and ETL tools like DataStage and Informatica

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure all mentioned as preferred experience

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds listed as preferred experience, no primary specified

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, ETL tools, and reporting which are typically batch-oriented

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as preferred tool, which is cloud-native orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus suggests data warehouse environment, Cognos reporting tool typically connects to warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies relocation may be required for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location is India, not US

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, location is India, not US

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies authorization to work in India is required, no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position in India typically implies W2 equivalent employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, only general 'continuous improvement' reference

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, suggesting collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (Cognos, UNIX, BI/DW) and nice-to-have skills (cloud platforms, ETL tools)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI reporting, ETL, and data integration with specific tool requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level BI/data engineering role
